name: Trello Bug Submission Form
description:
A Form to make a Trello card, made in Unity.

Want to use the form? Learn how to get your token and API key here: https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/trello/guides/rest-api/api-introduction/

WARNING: Although in all honesty, for security reasons, you really shouldn't. I promise I am not stealing your API token or key, but please be secure about them. This was more for an exercise rather than something I'd want people to rely on, I can not guarantee security for your keys and tokens.

Important Notes:

- This program pulls all of your available boards and the lists associated with them. It does not create a bug reporting board on your account automatically.

- The Severity Labels are current mapped to the three first labels reported by the API.
